relations.target: homosexual=01204965-a (sexually attracted to members of your own sex);10202544-n (someone who is sexually attracted to persons of the same sex)

gay=10202544-n (someone who is sexually attracted to persons of the same sex);00365018-a (bright and pleasant; promoting a feeling of cheer; \""a cheery hello\""; \""a gay sunny room\""; \""a sunny smile\"");00408228-a (brightly colored and showy; \""girls decked out in brave new dresses\""; \""brave banners flying\""; \""`braw' is a Scottish word\""; \""a dress a bit too gay for her years\""; \""birds with gay plumage\"");01205390-a (homosexual or arousing homosexual desires);01301656-a (given to social pleasures often including dissipation; \""led a gay Bohemian life\""; \""a gay old rogue with an eye for the ladies\"");01370347-a (offering fun and gaiety; \""a festive (or festal) occasion\""; \""gay and exciting night life\""; \""a merry evening\"");01370567-a (full of or showing high-spirited merriment; \""when hearts were young and gay\""; \""a poet could not but be gay, in such a jocund company\""- Wordsworth; \""the jolly crowd at the reunion\""; \""jolly old Saint Nick\""; \""a jovial old gentleman\""; \""have a merry Christmas\""; \""peals of merry laughter\""; \""a mirthful laugh\""

senses.definition: Somebody who is gay (in the sense of either homosexual or uncool).
